items.sentence: Why do you think that Tom won't pass the exam?
We need to finish this job before the weekend.
That's not the main reason Tom should do that.
Let's spend some time together this afternoon.
Tom has been a car salesman for several years.
Tom will be asleep by the time Mary gets home.
Tom is being careful not to get in Mary's way.
Tom won't be the first one to get off the bus.
How many people will you invite to your party?
You're the only one who ever really liked Tom.
You're the one Tom wants to take to the dance.
It's too bad that Tom isn't going to be there.
I was expecting something like this to happen.
Tom told me he was going to leave early today.
Tom speaks both French and English quite well.
Tom wants to apologize to Mary for doing that.
If we hadn't done that, someone else would've.
Tom is leaving for Australia tomorrow morning.
Tom immediately did what Mary asked him to do.
I knew that something bad was going to happen.
People do sometimes ask interesting questions.
Tom can't afford to buy the computer he wants.
I didn't know that Tom used to work in Boston.
We didn't find out about that until yesterday.
That was the moment that I started hating Tom.
Learning French won't be as easy as you think.
How would you feel is someone did that to you?
Running the store is becoming a burden to Tom.
My dog is sitting with me watching television.
Mary didn't know who had sent her the flowers.
Civilization is now threatened by nuclear war.
My mother made us cheese sandwiches for lunch.
Without his glasses, Tom is as blind as a bat.
If we hurry, we'll probably get there on time.
I don't have very many friends here in Boston.
I've already seen all I want to see in Boston.
My maternal grandmother was born in Australia.
I don't know whether Tom has a brother or not.
I doubt that I can get Tom to do that for you.
Tom made Mary a potato casserole with chicken.
Thanks for lending me the money that I needed.
I'll be living in Boston with my grandparents.
You may borrow my bicycle anytime you want to.
Both boys got on their bicycles and rode away.
If only I had a map, I could show you the way.
I can't read what's written on the blackboard.
Have you ever accepted a ride from a stranger?
I have to go back to the hospital next Monday.
Tom stopped in the middle of the intersection.
I showed Tom the pictures I'd taken in Boston.
